About Me

Motivated and detail-oriented Software Engineering graduate with 10 months of part-time full-stack development experience. Skilled in designing and developing scalable web and mobile applications using modern technologies like Kotlin, Angular, React, Node.js, and Firebase. Proven ability to deliver projects under pressure while continuously improving technical and soft skills.
